attributes.action: Ban fast food corporations sponsoring sports events
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned believe that if the Government is serious about tackling obesity they should ban fast food corporations like McDonalds and Coca Cola sponsoring sports events like the Olympics games 2012 where McDonalds are building their largest restaurant in the world.

rejection.details:
The responsibility for all aspects of staging the Games, including sponsorship, is that of the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG) who are a private organisation operating independently of Government.

LOCOG can be contacted by writing to: London 2012, One Churchill Place, Canary Wharf, London E14 5LN; Tel: 0203 2012 000; or email: enquiries@london2012.com.
